Title: I Can't Help It (If I'm Still in Love With You)
Plot: Teddy's mayoral campaign is moving ahead and Rayna reluctantly endures an investigation that reveals some explosive family secrets. Meanwhile Coleman Carlisle is starting to lay down the groundwork for his campaign when he discovers Lamar is poised to go head to head with him... even if it means exposing his longtime friend; Juliette, who will stop at nothing when it comes to getting her hands on Deacon; and Scarlett is torn between pursuing her dream of songwriting with Gunnar and her commitmen
GuestStars: Judith Hoag, JD Souther, Nicholas Strong
